messages.label: error

params.hints: Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table

statements.sql:
select b.*,c.name as cname,
(select count(*) from orderform as o where o.bid=b.id and o.express=2) as count
from business as b,category as c,address as a where a.did=786  and b.status=1 and a.bid=b.id and b.examine=2 and c.id=b.cid

params.hints: Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table

statements.sql: select name,(select count(*) from address where did=786) as count from district where id=786

params.hints:
Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table
The SELECT statement has no WHERE clause and could examine many more rows than intended
